an8.33:1.3: Chanda danam deti, dosa danam deti, moha danam deti, bhaya danam deti, ‘dinnapubbam katapubbam pitupitamahehi, narahami poranam kulavamsam hapetun’ti danam deti, ‘imaham danam datva kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjissami’ti danam deti, ‘imam me danam dadato cittam pasidati, attamanata somanassam upajayati’ti danam deti, cittalankaracittaparikkharattham danam deti.
